com.brightcove.player.drm

Class DrmUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.drm.DrmUtil

  • public final class DrmUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods to work DRM licenses.

        Returns:
        The created instance.
        Throws:
        com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.UnsupportedDrmException - If the DRM scheme is unsupported or cannot be instantiated.

      • getRemainingLicenseDuration

        public static long getRemainingLicenseDuration(@NonNull
                                               DrmSession drmSession)
        Finds the total number of remaining seconds that the DRM license is valid.
        Parameters:
        drmSession - reference to the DRM session.
        Returns:
        C.TIME_UNSET if the license duration is set, otherwise the duration as total of remaining seconds.

      • getRemainingPlaybackDuration

        public static long getRemainingPlaybackDuration(@NonNull
                                                DrmSession drmSession)
        Finds the total number of remaining seconds that the DRM license is valid for playback.
        Parameters:
        drmSession - reference to the DRM session.
        Returns:
        C.TIME_UNSET if the license duration is set, otherwise the duration as total of remaining seconds.

      • getLicenseDuration

        public static android.util.Pair<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Long> getLicenseDuration(DrmSession drmSession)
        Returns license and playback durations remaining in seconds.
        Parameters:
        drmSession - reference to the DRM session.
        Returns:
        A Pair consisting of the remaining license and playback durations in seconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called when a session isn't opened.
